name: Armout's Fires
description:
Armaut's fires

Armaut's fires is a puzzel prototype made while making a game for Brackeys game jam 2021.2, its not a submission but I spend like 2 day so, I decided to 

turn it into atleast a small prototype .With 15 levels.

Controls - Left click on one fire to to rotate it , Right click  on one fire to to negatively rotate it .

                                Story

Seven fires trying to find their master Armout.

                           Please note that -                                  

This game is only a prtotype so don't expect that much  but if you like it  please give some feedback about it for updates.
